title: Having trouble signing in
body: So I recently got a new computer and so I had to reinstall league of legends. its installed now but when the percentage thing where the play button would be reaches 10%, it stops applying the patches and say that "Were unable to log you on because you may be offline." this is the first time I have seen this happen. and now it is happening every time I try to update the latest patches and I can't sign into the game. Does anyone have a solution to this issue.

replies.body: Since this is a new pc, you may still need to update some of your [**firewall or network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure your network can get a solid connection to our servers. Give that a go and let me know if it helps or not!
